name: Flesh and Bones
description:
You weren’t around until someone thought of you.

It was then that you emerged from nothingness into this world - a small light in the dark.

But with no beating heart, no limbs to do your bidding - how can you survive?

After all… Ideas can only live as long as someone believes in them.

If the game looks all glitchy at first - refresh the page!

Using the 'howler' package which handles audio files in dart - so:
